about-company.paragraph1: Established in 2013, Civil Construction Group LLC is a leading construction company specializing in commercial, industrial, mining, and renewable energy projects. We provide expert design, turnkey solutions, and contracting services. With over 11 years of experience, our highly skilled team brings extensive knowledge and expertise to every project.
about-company.paragraph2: Our services encompass Residential Construction, Commercial Construction, Project Management, Design and Build, Sustainable Construction, Specialized Services, Infrastructure Development and Consulting Services; all while maintaining the highest standards in quality, occupational health and safety, and environmental sustainability.

services.service3: Continually delivering cost savings to clients
services.service4: Business relationships built on reliability, trust and integrity
services.service6: Strict management of timelines and delivery milestones
services.service7: Innovation and creativity in solution development, thereby using non-standard approaches to create exceptional
services.service8: Higher purpose and vision that goes well beyond any individual project to create a better future for the community and a sustainable environment
services.title: We provide

summary.point1: Has successfully completed projects working jointly with more than 60 companies
summary.point2: Employs over 50 qualified staff and more than 250 permanent workers
summary.point3: Owns more than 40 construction machinery and equipment
summary.point4: Has the best atmosphere of team working
summary.point5: Provides good career for personals-not only experience but also constant training
summary.title: Our company

team.paragraph1: Our project teams consist of highly skilled and experienced project engineers, project managers, support staff, site foremen, HSE team and operators. We regularly train our staff in the latest systems and procedures that adhere to the highest standards of safety management and ensure that key personnel are qualified in first aid. We continue to invest in the training of our staff to provide cost-effective and innovative work on all projects while maintaining high quality, occupational health & safety and environmental standards.
team.title: Our team

vacancy.description: Our project teams consist of highly skilled and experienced project engineers, project managers, support staff, site foremen, HSE team and operators. We regularly train our staff in the latest systems and procedures that adhere to the highest standards of safety management and ensure that key personnel are qualified in first aid. We continue to invest in the training of our staff to provide cost-effective and innovative work on all projects while maintaining high quality, occupational health & safety and environmental standards.
vacancy.main_statement: We succeeded in having built a team of true professionals
vacancy.statement1: The company has the best atmosphere of team working.
vacancy.statement2: We have already completed several international projects and are continuing to work on new national and international projects.
vacancy.statement3: We guide our employees not only to enhance their experience and skills but also to become creative and innovative.
